However, the United States remained resistant to his latest album, and sales began to drop; it was at this point that Prince decided to film a live concert promoting the new material, for eventual distribution to theaters in America.  Featuring the band that accompanied Prince on his 1987 Sign o' the Times Tour, including dancer Cat Glover, keyboardist Boni Boyer, bassist Levi Seacer, Jr., guitarist Miko Weaver, drummer Sheila E. and former member of The Revolution keyboardist Dr. Fink, the film sees the group perform live on stage (although \"U Got the Look\" is represented by its promotional music video).","poster_path":"/o6Uiv5XXJZd4RJdkXfQt8JoAEnZ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10402,99],"popularity":9.25,"release_date":"1987-11-20","video":false,"vote_average":7.2,"vote_count":39},{"backdrop_path":"/hBxdPi4cedZNCVtiu7ajaR3JY6h.jpg","id":20330,"title":"Beyond a Reasonable Doubt","original_title":"Beyond a Reasonable Doubt","overview":"A newspaper publisher, wanting to prove a point about the insufficiency of circumstantial evidence, talks his possible son-in-law Tom into a hoax in an attempt to expose ineptitude of the city's hard-line district attorney. The plan is to have Tom plant clues leading to his arrest for killing a female nightclub dancer. Once Tom is found guilty, he is to reveal the setup and humiliate the DA.","poster_path":"/en5rlVq8w4JSrxXForJhMP2S0xY.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[80,18],"popularity":12.303,"release_date":"1956-09-13","video":false,"vote_average":6.878,"vote_count":104},{"backdrop_path":"/kfGRT4o60d3pWlRsMamz5kC4Vl.jpg","id":30194,"title":"The Manhattan Project","original_title":"The Manhattan Project","overview":"Named after the World War II-era program, the plot revolves around a gifted high school student who decides to construct a nuclear bomb for a national science fair. Twenty years after the murders, a filmmaker finds that there might be hidden reasons as to why it has remained unsolved all these years.","poster_path":"/9m4v117lZRr2GYuo117WOph1fLx.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99,80],"popularity":0.582,"release_date":"2023-04-22","video":false,"vote_average":6.0,"vote_count":2},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":8930,"title":"Modern Life","original_title":"Profils paysans: La vie moderne","overview":"For ten years, Raymond Depardon has followed the lives of farmer living in the mountain ranges. He allows us to enter their farms with astounding naturalness. This moving film speaks, with great serenity, of our roots and of the future of the people who work on the land. This the last part of Depardon's triptych \"Profils paysans\" about what it is like to be a farmer today in an isolated highland area in France. \"La vie moderne\" examines what has become of the persons he has followed for ten years, while featuring younger people who try to farm or raise cattle or poultry, come hell or high water.","poster_path":"/h8IWYCY8fA1VclmjZghVQ3sZwsN.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":5.202,"release_date":"2008-10-29","video":false,"vote_average":7.6,"vote_count":19},{"backdrop_path":"/bf3nz2zKAjRqCh94pEIiwNYzeeg.jpg","id":1193125,"title":"Kevin Hart \u0026 Chris Rock: Headliners Only","original_title":"Kevin Hart \u0026 Chris Rock: Headliners Only","overview":"From back in the day to the top of their game, Kevin Hart and Chris Rock offer an unparalleled, behind-the-scenes look at their friendship and careers.","poster_path":"/4dwKP2S9XJVKnTyEpmh8jaiWKpm.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99,35],"popularity":8.723,"release_date":"2023-12-12","video":false,"vote_average":6.25,"vote_count":12},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":68333,"title":"Beyoncé: Live at Glastonbury 2011","original_title":"Beyoncé: Live at Glastonbury 2011","overview":"Beyonce took to the Glastonbury Festival Pyramid Stage for a groundbreaking performance in front of 170,000 people. Every day, he drills a hole through a wall and looks into one of the rooms, each time seeing a different surreal vision...","poster_path":"/clZf3gJk3bU185UQv6d1pcbbbG2.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"cs","genre_ids":[16],"popularity":2.374,"release_date":"1969-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.207,"vote_count":29},{"backdrop_path":"/zKsHlqC0lSaXCML1JWDbxEfrK9Y.jpg","id":146563,"title":"Under Ten Flags","original_title":"Sotto dieci bandiere","overview":"\"Under Ten Flags\" is a WWII movie loosely  based on the true story of the German navy commerce raider Atlantis, a converted Auxilliary Cruiser, and her Captain Bernhard Rogge.  Atlantis, camouflaged as a merchant ship, cruised the South Seas ( Atlantic, Indian \u0026amp; Pacific) and sank or captured 22 merchant ships from May 1940 through November 22, 1941 when she was sunk by the British Cruiser HMS Devonshire.  Rogge was one of the few German officers of flag rank who were not arrested by the Allies after the war ended. This was due to the very proper and ethical way he exercised his command of Atlantis. After the war he advanced to Rear Admiral in the West German Navy and became a high-ranking NATO commander.","poster_path":"/9YguRj7i0386C2HIiOwvUdpN0wm.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[36,10752],"popularity":12.135,"release_date":"1960-09-15","video":false,"vote_average":5.3,"vote_count":16},{"backdrop_path":"/yW3fSZFUVgAyHzWobVmWE3BTr8p.jpg","id":14154,"title":"WarGames: The Dead Code","original_title":"WarGames: The Dead Code","overview":"Computer hacker Will Farmer engages a government super-computer named Ripley in an online terrorist-attack simulation game.
